text: la tecidu kavmey yu'minune billahi velyevmi-l'ahiri yuvaddune men hadde-llahe verasulehu velev kanu abaehum ev ebnaehum ev ihvanehum ev `asiratehum. ulaike ketebe fi kulubihimu-l'imane veeyyedehum biruhim minh. veyudhiluhum cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu halidine fiha. radiye-llahu `anhum veradu `anh. ulaike hizbu-llah. ela inne hizbe-llahi humu-lmuflihun
